long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy tabs and bookmarks manager with intuitive hotkeys.

You can 
- see a list of tabs opened in current window
- open or close a tab
- check tab items and close it at once
- check tab items and save it in bookmark folder like snapshot
- search tab with keywords

- explore bookmark tree
- see a list of all the bookmarks you saved
- check bookmark item and remove it at once
- search bookmark with keywords

also you can
- do everything with hotkeys
